articles.description: The cancer of the head and neck are found to be progressing at a CAGR of 23 per cent, prostate cancer at 19 per cent, ovarian cancer at 11 per cent and breast cancer at 8 per cent, which is faster than the overall growth rate of incidence.
articles.content: New Delhi: Real cancer incidence level in India is estimated to be 1.5 to three times higher than the reported incidence as 51 per cent of patients take more than a week to conclude diagnosis while 4… [+2628 chars]

articles.title: Struggling with low blood sugar? Try a unique trick to regulate the levels naturally - Times Now
articles.description: Experts say that when blood sugar drops, a shot of sugar can help revive it – such as juice, candy, or fruits but this may take a few minutes to happen. However, one must be mindful before filling up on carbs mindlessly only to witness a sudden spike and drop…
